testsuite.name: cs.home.shopping.service.CartServiceTest

testcase.name: when a regular Customer adds 3 shirts to cart then total should be 71.98
when a regular Customer adds 2 shirts and 2 jeans to cart then total should be 166.99
when a VIP Customer adds 3 dresses to cart then total should be 161.50
when a VIP Customer adds 2 jeans and 2 dresses to cart then total should be 227.00
when a VIP Customer adds 4 shirts and 1 jeans to cart then total should be 173.47
when adding new products then should create an item
when adding existing products then should add to existing

testsuite.system-out: 23:50:12.253 [Test worker] INFO cs.home.shopping.service.CartService -- Adding productId 2 (quantity: 1) on cart with customerId 1 23:50:12.259 [Test worker] INFO cs.home.shopping.service.CartService -- Item not found, adding it 23:50:12.282 [Test worker] INFO cs.home.shopping.service.CartService -- Adding productId 1 (quantity: 1) on cart with customerId 1 23:50:12.282 [Test worker] INFO cs.home.shopping.service.CartService -- Item found, increasing quantity
